description: This file defines an Angular service called AuthService that manages user authentication state, including login, signup, logout, and session initialization, leveraging a Supabase backend for auth operations.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: An Angular service that manages authentication state, including login, signup, logout, and session management.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts to sign in a user with provided email and password, updates auth state upon success.

methods.name: signup
methods.description: Registers a new user with provided email and password via Supabase.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Signs out the current user and resets auth state.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Returns an observable that emits the current authentication status.

methods.name: getUserId
methods.description: Returns an observable that emits the current user ID or null if not authenticated.
